Thing1.name: Video Games
Thing1.description: I like to play video games with my friends in my opinion is a way to de-stress me when I have a lot of homework.

Thing2.name: Movie Night
Thing2.description: I like to watch movies at night after classes or work, I like to watch with my family and friends.

Thing3.name: Drive
Thing3.description: I like to drive when it's raining my family thinks that is weird but I feel it relaxing.

Thing4.name: Listen to Music
Thing4.description: I like to listen to music or podcast meanwhile driving or doing homework, I like to have white noise or a conversation in the background so I don't feel stressed.
